name: Focused Discipline
text: Familiarity with the military traditions of your homeland inspires uncommon valor in you.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on all saving throws against fear effects. Whenever a fear effect targets you and fails to affect you (either because of a successful saving throw or because of immunity to fear), you gain a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and CMB checks against the creature that attempted to use the fear affect on you for 1 round.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points in order to gain the benefit of Focused Discipline for 1 round as if you had been targeted by a fear effect that failed to affect you.
text_zh: 你对家乡的军事传统的熟悉，使你获得了非同寻常的勇气。
benefit_zh: 你在对抗所有恐惧效果（fear effects）时的豁免检定获得+2加值。每当恐惧效果以你为目标并且未能影响到你（无论是由于成功的豁免检定还是由于免疫恐惧），你在对抗使用该恐惧效果未遂的生物时，攻击检定，武器伤害检定与CMB检定均获得+2士气加值，持续1轮。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来获得严守纪律的好处一轮，就如同你成为了一个未能影响到你的恐惧效果的目标一样。
